name: 2:00 Dash To Class
description:
2:00 Dash To Class is a game about helping a student get to class on time, by 2 o’ clock. The setting is a college campus which begins with leaving the dorm. You walk along the sidewalk, which consists of obstacles, in an attempt to reach your final destination: the science building. The obstacles consists of avoiding skunks trying to spray you, dodging thunderclouds, running from sick students, steering clear of angry librarians & avoiding swarms of bees.

The theme of the game jam I entered was the number two and the theme of this game is 2:00 pm. The entire game consists of obstacles that you must avoid in order to make it to class by that time. There is a timer that stops at 2:00. You can also choose between two colors for your character - white and black- and choose between two paths at a certain section of the game.

There are no links since none of the assets were taken from the internet. I made all of the assets featured in the game myself using pixel art.

Controls:

*Arrow keys - move

*Right Shift - Jump

* 'o' key - Interact

*'p' key - Pause
